trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，所选节点在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件仍会不同于当前所选内容的颜色突出显示颜色时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件失去焦点。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于保留时在用户单击窗体上一个不同的控件，或将移动到不同的窗口由可见用户选定的项。

trans-unit.source: If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你担心你的应用程序的可访问性，建议你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeSelectedTreeView` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中的窗体和调用`InitializeSelectedTreeView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: 提供给定位置的节点信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> at which to retrieve node information.
trans-unit.target: 在其中检索节点信息的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given a point.
trans-unit.target: 提供给定位置的节点信息。

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: 节点信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a point is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定点是否位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>和节点内点所在的位置，如于标签或图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to retrieve node information
trans-unit.target: 在其中检索节点信息的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to retrieve node information.
trans-unit.target: 在其中检索节点信息的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在给定 x 和 y 坐标的情况下，提供节点信息。

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: 节点信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a set of x- and y-coordinates is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定是否一组的 x 坐标和 y 坐标位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>和节点内点所在的位置，如于标签或图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Level%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Level%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `treeView1` and populate it with several levels of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，创建一个包含的 Windows 窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>名为`treeView1`并填充与多个级别的节点。

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into the form and associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method in this example.
trans-unit.target: 将以下代码粘贴到窗体并将关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件`treeView1`与`treeView1_MouseDown`在此示例中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示当鼠标指针移过树节点标签时，树节点标签是否具有超链接的外观。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当鼠标指针移过树节点标签时，树节点标签具有超链接的外观，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>属性设置为`true`，每个树节点标签都将当鼠标指针移超链接的外观，通过它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Underline> font style is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> is set to blue to make the label appear as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle.Underline>字体样式应用于<xref:System.Drawing.Font>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>设置为蓝色，从而使显示为链接的标签。

trans-unit.source: The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 外观不由用户的操作系统的 Internet 设置控制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property is set to `false`, the customized control also overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A> method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性设置为`false`，该自定义的控件还将重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A>方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。

trans-unit.source: A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树节点显示的默认图像的图像列表索引值。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>是互相排斥的属性; 如果已设置，另一个被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>自动设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>自动设置为一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 设置时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性在运行时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 以更新控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致所有树节点除了所选折叠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and assigns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and fills the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件和填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件替换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes are assigned images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that are displayed when in a selected or unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 树节点都分配中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，将显示在所选的或未选定状态时。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, and an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains `Customer` objects that each contain `Order` objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，和<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>包含`Customer`对象，每个包含`Order`对象。

trans-unit.source: It is also assumed that the `Customer` and `Order` objects are defined.
trans-unit.target: 此外假定`Customer`和`Order`定义对象。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 控件中的每个节点在处于未选定状态时的默认图像的键。

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 为每个节点 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 控件在节点处于未选定状态时显示的默认图像的键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>属性是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>没有设置，通过指定的映像的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>属性将显示当未选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 选中节点时中的第一个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>将显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性是互斥的这意味着如果已设置，另一个被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性自动设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>自动设置为一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含树节点所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含树节点所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>属性的值不是`null`，所有树节点都显示在最前面<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>。

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定选定和未选定的节点显示从列表中的映像，应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象可以指定哪个映像将显示通过设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: 各项设置将替代的相应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>属性。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.1 版中，没有问题，可防止映像上出现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>节点时应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中你`Main`方法之后立即调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此问题固定的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and assigns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and fills the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件和填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件替换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes are assigned images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that are displayed when in a selected or unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 树节点都分配中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，将显示在所选的或未选定状态时。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, and an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains `Customer` objects that each contain `Order` objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，和<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>包含`Customer`对象，每个包含`Order`对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每个子树节点级别的缩进距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 每个子树节点级别的缩进距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 19。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为-1 的值不引发异常，如果值已不已更改不再是默认值。

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为该控件为内部的默认值在创建控件句柄之前，都使用值-1。

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: 此内部默认值会导致要返回其自己的默认值为 19 的已包装的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A> method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性设置为 false，则该自定义的控件还将重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A>方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。

trans-unit.source: A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is greater than 32,000.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值大于 32,000。

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: 一个键值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the user is editing a tree node, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control treats keys such as ENTER, ESC, HOME, and END as input keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户正在编辑树节点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件将视为输入键如 ENTER、 ESC、 主页和最终的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging a node.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable drag-and-drop operations within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何中启用拖放操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, any node can be dragged to another node that is not a descendant of the dragged node.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，可以将任何节点拖动到不被拖动节点的后代的另一个节点。

trans-unit.source: The dragged node, which includes all its descendant nodes, becomes a child of the destination node.
trans-unit.target: 被拖动的节点，其中包括所有子代节点，将成为目标节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: When the left mouse button is used, the dragged node is moved to the destination node.
trans-unit.target: 当使用鼠标左键时，拖动的节点移动到目标节点。

trans-unit.source: When the right mouse button is used, the dragged node is copied to the destination node.
trans-unit.target: 当使用鼠标右键按钮时，被拖动的节点复制到目标节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件中每个树节点的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of each tree node in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 树视图控件中每个树节点的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: If the item height is set to a value larger than the height of the tree view control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method will have unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果将项的高度设置为值大于树视图控件的高度，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将具有意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the size <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A> to the specified size and adjusts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A> of the tree node's parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的大小更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A>为指定的大小和调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A>的树节点的父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that contains font sizes.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>的集合的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>包含字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的值小于一。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is greater than the <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值大于 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示是否可以编辑树节点的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以编辑树节点的标签文本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A> method works only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>方法才可以工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>是`false`当你尝试编辑标签，将引发异常且树节点将不被放入到可编辑状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用户可以通过编辑非根树节点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: When the user right clicks the mouse, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`.
trans-unit.target: 当用户右键单击鼠标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>该位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。

trans-unit.source: If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, which allows the user to edit the node label.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了非根树节点，它会处于可编辑状态，这样用户就可以编辑此节点标签。

trans-unit.source: After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved.
trans-unit.target: 在用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。

trans-unit.source: For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。

trans-unit.source: If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签字符串中的无效字符之一是或字符串为空，则会通知用户的错误和标签返回到其以前的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the lines connecting the nodes of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 控件的节点的线条的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the lines connecting the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 连接树节点的线条的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> line color.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>线条颜色。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体。

trans-unit.source: Call `InitializeLineTreeView` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InitializeLineTreeView`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击使用鼠标，包括加号树节点中的任何部分，将发生此事件 (**+**) 或负号 (**-**)，该值指示节点是否处于折叠状态或展开。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当用户双击鼠标，包括加号 （+） 或减号 （-），该值指示节点是否是折叠或展开树任何的节点部分，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick> event and how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeMouseClickEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick>事件以及如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeMouseClickEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `treeView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>名为`treeView1`。

trans-unit.source: Populate `treeView1` with the names of files located in the `c:\` directory of the system the sample is running on, and associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick> event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick` method in this example.
trans-unit.target: 填充`treeView1`中的文件的名称与`c:\`目录的系统运行此示例和相关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseDoubleClick>事件`treeView1`与`treeView1_NodeMouseDoubleClick`在此示例中的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the user has administrator privileges on the machine running the example.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求用户运行该示例的计算机上具有管理员特权。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标悬停在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 上时发生。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover> event will occur before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover>事件发生一次之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `TreeView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>名为`TreeView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取分配给树视图控件的树节点集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection" /> that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection" />，表示分配给树视图控件的树节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property holds a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, each of which has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>属性包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象，其中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>可以包含其自己的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 此嵌套的树节点可能会使其难以导航树状结构，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>属性，则可以更方便地确定你树状结构中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays customer information in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer.
trans-unit.target: 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。

trans-unit.source: In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。

trans-unit.source: The repainting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> methods, and a wait <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> is displayed while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> creates and paints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 重新绘制的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>抑制的使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>方法和等待<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>显示时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>创建并绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that you have created an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求你创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck(System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck(System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck(System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCheck(System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCollapse" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCollapse" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCollapse%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterCollapse%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnKeyDown%2A> method switches between selecting and clearing the check box when the user presses the SPACEBAR.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spacing between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control's contents and its edges.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 控件的内容和它的边缘之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> indicating the space between the control edges and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 指示控件边缘与其内容之间的间距的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Padding" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Padding" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delimiter string that the tree node path uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树节点路径所使用的分隔符串。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter string that the tree node <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath" /> property uses.
trans-unit.target: 树节点 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath" /> 属性所使用的分隔符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is the backslash character (\\).
trans-unit.target: 默认值是反斜杠字符 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: The tree node path consists of a set of tree node labels separated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> delimiter strings.
trans-unit.target: 树节点路径包含一组隔开的树节点标签<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>分隔符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The labels range from the root tree node to the tree node that you want.
trans-unit.target: 标签范围内的根树节点所需的树节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> and displays the number of child tree nodes that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>并显示中包含的子树节点数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of child tree node to total tree nodes in the tree view control is also displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示的子树节点的树视图控件中的总树节点的百分比。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that has several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects (preferably with three or more levels).
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件替换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>，具有多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>（最好是使用三个或多个级别） 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> should be laid out from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 是否应从右向左布局。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control should be laid out from right-to-left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指示控件应该从右向左布局，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is for use with international applications where the language is read from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性以用于国际应用程序是从右到左阅读的语言。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> to `true` the control's contents and text will be laid out from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>到`true`控件的内容和文本将布局从右到左。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayout" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `TreeView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>名为`TreeView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示树视图控件是否在需要时显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果树视图控件在需要时显示滚动条，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is located outside the control's client region.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，滚动条上显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>位于控件的客户端区域外。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 设置时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>属性在运行时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 以更新控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致所有树节点除了所选折叠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>枚举和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeTreeView` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中的窗体和调用`InitializeTreeView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当树节点选定时所显示的图像的图像列表索引值。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引值，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 设置时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性在运行时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>重新创建句柄 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 以更新控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致所有树节点，除所选折叠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and assigns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and fills the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件和填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件替换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes are assigned images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that are displayed when in a selected or unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 树节点都分配中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，将显示在所选的或未选定状态时。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, and an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains `Customer` objects that each contain `Order` objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，和<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>包含`Customer`对象，每个包含`Order`对象。

trans-unit.source: It is also assumed that the `Customer` and `Order` objects are defined.
trans-unit.target: 此外假定`Customer`和`Order`定义对象。

trans-unit.source: The index assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的索引值小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image shown when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 处于选定状态时显示的默认图像的键。

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 处于选定状态时显示的默认图像的键。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have a selected image set, the image specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A> property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>没有选择的映像设置，通过指定的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A>属性将显示当未选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>是互相排斥的属性; 如果已设置，另一个被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性自动设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageKey%2A>自动设置为一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tree node that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前在树视图控件中选定的树节点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 当前在树视图控件中选定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is currently selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>当前已选定，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the specified node is scrolled into view and any parent nodes are expanded so that the specified node is visible.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的节点被滚动到视图并展开节点，以便指定的节点是可见的任何父。

trans-unit.source: When the parent node or any ancestor node of the selected node is collapsed either programmatically or through user action, the collapsed node becomes the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 父节点或所选节点的所有祖先节点处于折叠状态或者以编程方式或通过用户执行任何操作，折叠的节点将成为所选的节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> and displays the number of child tree nodes that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>并显示中包含的子树节点数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of child tree node to total tree nodes in the tree view control is also displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此外显示的子树节点的树视图控件中的总树节点的百分比。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that has several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects (preferably with three or more levels).
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件替换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>，具有多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>（最好是使用三个或多个级别） 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示是否在树视图控件中的树节点之间绘制连线。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在树视图控件中的树节点之间绘制连线，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A> method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性设置为 false，则该自定义的控件还将重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A>方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。

trans-unit.source: A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针悬停在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标指针悬停在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 上时显示工具提示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In order for ToolTips to be visible, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 为了使工具提示可见，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowNodeToolTips%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowNodeToolTips%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeTreeViewWithToolTips` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeTreeViewWithToolTips`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示是否在包含子树节点的树节点旁显示加号 (+) 和减号 (-) 按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在包含子树节点的树节点旁显示加号和减号按钮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根树节点才旁边的加号和减号按钮出现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显示的加号和减号按钮，没有视觉提示存在是为了指示树节点，包含子树节点并且是可扩展的。

trans-unit.source: The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it.
trans-unit.target: 然后，用户必须双击树节点以确定其是否包含子树节点，以将其展开，或将其折叠起来。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class, this custom version has all the functionality of a typical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>类，此自定义版本具有的典型的所有功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供独特外观。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A> method so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性设置为 false，则该自定义的控件还将重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.OnAfterSelect%2A>方法，以便可以展开和折叠在被单击时节点。

trans-unit.source: A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式自定义的控件可以使用整个组织，从而便于提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示是否在树视图根处的树节点之间绘制连线。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在树视图根处的树节点之间绘制连线，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property is `false`, the plus-sign and minus-sign buttons will not appear next to the root tree nodes, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性是`false`，加号和减号按钮旁边的根树节点中，将不会出现与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>属性将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>枚举和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HideSelection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeTreeView` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中的窗体和调用`InitializeTreeView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 控件中的项进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将重新应用默认排序，这是按字母顺序的节点文本或指定自定义排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改现有节点的文本或节点被移动用户，并且你想要再次的项进行排序，可以使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认排序<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用以指示树视图中的树节点是否经过排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果树视图中的树节点经过排序，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sorted%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects are sorted in alphabetical order by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sorted%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象按字母顺序进行排序其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: You should always use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> to maintain performance when you add a large quantity of items to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 应始终使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>若要维护性能，当将大量项添加到一个经过排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: When the text of an existing node is changed, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> to resort the items.
trans-unit.target: 现有节点的文本更改时，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>需采用项。

trans-unit.source: The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认排序<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像列表，该列表用于指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 及其节点的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> used for indicating the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 及其节点的状态的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />。

trans-unit.source: To indicate the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示的状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>属性并且还设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 在显示的状态图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>是默认情况下的 16 x 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>将它们对如何显示映像没有影响。

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 但是，状态图像将调整根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目：

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>设置为`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>设置属性时，每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>显示的第一个和第二个图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>以指示取消选中或选中状态，分别。

trans-unit.source: You should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property before you add nodes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set.
trans-unit.target: 应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>属性添加到节点之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>以防止在没有状态图像的节点的设计时显示的状态图像设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeCheckTreeView` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeCheckTreeView`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 的文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="Null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树视图控件中第一个完全可见的树节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> that represents the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />，表示树视图控件中第一个完全可见的树节点。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TopNode%2A> returns the first root tree node, which is located at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TopNode%2A>返回的第一个的根树节点，位于顶部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the user has scrolled the contents, another tree node might be at the top.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户已经滚动内容，另一个树节点可能位于顶部。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性未包含任何时生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>属性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeLabelEdit><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TopNode%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeLabelEdit><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TopNode%2A>成员。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a `TreeView` control that is named `TreeView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中一个包含窗体`TreeView`控件名为`TreeView1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeTreeView` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InitializeTreeView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）；如果 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 未命名，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation of <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> to perform a custom sort of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 的实现，以对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 节点执行自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> to perform the custom sort.
trans-unit.target: 执行自定义排序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />。

trans-unit.source: The custom sort is applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: 应用自定义排序时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label is changed, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> method to sort the items again with the custom sorter specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>标签发生了更改，你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>方法对项进行排序再次与由指定的自定义排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认排序<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>应用程序所指定。

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>具有相等的值对象保存在添加到的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此行为可能不同，如果应用自定义排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property to sort nodes from smallest to largest.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>属性从最小到最大的节点进行排序。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeTreeView1` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeTreeView1`从窗体的构造函数或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of tree nodes that can be fully visible in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 获取树视图控件中完全可见的树节点的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> items that can be fully visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> 控件中完全可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> 项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.VisibleCount%2A> value can be greater than the number of tree nodes in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.VisibleCount%2A>值可以是大于在树视图中的树节点数。

trans-unit.source: The value is calculated by dividing the height of the client window by the height of a tree node item.
trans-unit.target: 除以的树节点项的高度由客户端窗口的高度计算的值。

trans-unit.source: The result is the total number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> can display within its current dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 结果是总数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>可以显示在其当前的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code when getting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码时获取的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
